title: "Inworld AI Secures $30 Million, Pushing Valuation To $500 Million"
excerpt: "Inworld AI recently secured $30 million from Lightspeed Venture Partners, pushing its valuation to $500 million. In addition to Lightspeed, the round also includes investments from Stanford University, Samsung Next, Microsoft Corp.'s M12 fund, First Spark Ventures and LG Technology Ventures."
